name: KUB datalab
Description: KUB Datalab is Copenhagen University Librarys centre for working with data. Our primary focus is to support students at the University of Copenhagen in regards to their work with data and digital methods.
Hardware: Seven Lenovo M900 3003. Core I7 - 6700. 32 GB Ram. 1 TB disk and six HP Z4. i9-7900X. NVIDIA QUADRO RTX4000 8GB
Collaborations: Digital Lab (D-lab) - University of Bergen Library
